title: Worked Solution
text:
We can determine whether the value is a solution to the equation by substituting $$y= rac{3}{5}$$ into the equation and seeing if the equation is true:

$$5\left( rac{3}{5}ight)$$ + $$3$$ $$=$$ $$\operatorname{10}\left( rac{3}{5}ight)$$ - $$4$$

$$3$$ + $$3$$ $$=$$ $$6$$ - $$4$$

$$6$$ $$=$$ $$6$$

Since both sides are equal, the equation is true. Therefore, $$y= rac{3}{5}$$ is a solution to the equation.
